nodes.bodyText: It is normal that you have deleted this file?
I found that it is not used.

I understand that it is more coherent with our IIDM modeling to have 2 parameters to mention that the shunt as to be split, one for T2W and one for T3W. But for the powerflow engines I know, these two parameters should be identical (false for both or true for both). So I am not sure, I need to ask my colleagues.
It is maybe dangerous to have 2 parameters as in the use cases I have in mind these two parameters should be equal. Do you have in mind a use case where these two parameters could be different ?
No, but I will review the IOP cases to check it
